name: The Apprentice Rises
Ambush: Add a random new Mastermind to the game with one Tactic.

name: The Blood Thickens
Ambush: Shuffle an additional Master Strike into the Villain Deck. Then, play another card from the Villain Deck.

name: Empire of Oppression
description: Each players hand size is one less. (This applies when they draw a new hand.)

name: Endless Hatred
description: Whenever you complete a Scheme Twist, also play the Mastermind's Master Strike ability

name: Fight to the End
description: After you defeat the Mastermind's four Tactics, you must still fight the Mastermind a fifth time to put the Mastermind card in your Victory Pile and win.

name: Growing Thread
description: The Mastermind has +1 Attack for each Mastermind Tactic among all players' Victory Piles.

name: Legions upon Legions
description: Whenever you play a Henchman Villain from the Villain Deck, play another card from the Villain Deck.

name: Misery upon Misery
description: Whenever you play a Bystander from the Villain Deck, play another card from the Villain Deck.

name: Pain upon Pain
description: Whenever you complete a Master Strike, play another card from the Villain Deck.

name: The Plot Thickens
Ambush: Shuffle an additional Scheme Twist into the Villain Deck.

name: Plots upon Plots
description: Whenever you complete a Scheme Twist, play another card from the Villain Deck.

name: Psychic Infection
Ambush: Put this into your discard pile. If this is in your hand at the start of your turn, the player on your left gains this card, then each player discards a card.

name: Shadow of the Disciple
description: This Horror Ascends to become a new 9-Attack "Master Plan" Token Mastermind worth 5 VP. It gains the ability "Master Strike: Each player reveals a Tech Hero or gains a Wound."

name: Surprise Assault
Ambush: Play two cards from the Villain Deck.

name: Viral Infection
Ambush: Put this into your discard pile. If this is in your hand at the start of your turn, the player on your left gains this card and the player on your right gains a Wound.
